articles.title: Fire raging near Ukraine's Chornobyl poses radiation risk, activists warn
articles.description: A huge forest fire in Ukraine that has been raging for more than a week is now just one kilometer from the defunct Chornobyl nuclear power plant and poses a radiation risk, Greenpeace Russia warned on Monday, citing satellite images.
